numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I notice that basketball is the most popular sport.
2. In most sports, basketball players are 50% or more of the players.
3. I wonder if basketball is still more popular than other sports.
4. This graph has an impact on the community.
5. This impact concerns the number of players who play basketball.
6. This impact also concerns the number of people who play basketball as a paying job.
7. The graph shows several types of basketball players.
8. These basketball players are involved in major sports leagues.
9. The headline is: Players who play in major sports leagues in basketball.
